001package com.github.sormuras.bach.project;
002
003import java.nio.file.Path;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
006
007public record ProjectSpace(String name, List<ProjectSpace> parents, DeclaredModules modules) {
008
009  @FunctionalInterface
010  public interface Operator extends UnaryOperator<ProjectSpace> {}
011
012  public DeclaredModule module(String name) {
013    return modules.find(name).orElseThrow();
014  }
015
016  public ProjectSpace withModule(DeclaredModule module) {
017    return new ProjectSpace(name, parents, modules.with(module));
018  }
019
020  public ProjectSpace withModule(String info) {
021    return withModule(Path.of(info), module -> module);
022  }
023
024  public ProjectSpace withModule(String info, String main) {
025    return withModule(Path.of(info), module -> module.withMainClass(main));
026  }
027
028  public ProjectSpace withModule(Path info, DeclaredModule.Operator operator) {
029    return withModule(operator.apply(DeclaredModule.of(info.toString())));
030  }
031
032  ProjectSpace tweak(DeclaredModule.Tweak tweak) {
033    return this == tweak.space() ? new ProjectSpace(name, parents, modules.tweak(tweak)) : this;
034  }
035}
